= Java hOCR =

Library to parse and perform conversion from hocr files to pdf, merging the image file and mapping the hocr data into one document.

http://jhocr.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/resources/design/com.googlecode.jhocr_logo_v01.png



= Maven Support =

{{{
<dependency>
  <groupId>com.googlecode</groupId>
  <artifactId>jhocr</artifactId>
  <version>0.0.4</version>
</dependency>
}}}
